articles.title: Grab Samsung's Latest Galaxy S22 for as Low as $100 Right Now - CNET
articles.description: With Samsung's current promotions, you can get double the storage for free and save up to $700 when you trade in your old device.
articles.content: While plenty of retailers and carriers are offering deals on Samsung's latest Galaxy S22 phones, many will require you to get locked into a 24- or 36-month contract and pay it off in installments. If… [+1547 chars]
